data.comment: Today's referee, Danny Makkelie, has blown to start the match.
David Lennart Philipp scores to make it 1-0 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
In the minute 13, Pascu instrumental with a fine assist.
Joey Veerman grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Cars Jeans Stadion.
That's a fine assist from Ibrahim Dresevic.
In the minute 27, At Cars Jeans Stadion, Henk Veerman has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The home team has substituted David Lennart Philipp with Ricardo Kishna. Ruud Brood is thus making his first change.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Rami Hajal is on a sub for Ibrahim Dresevic for Heerenveen.
Couhaib Driouech is replacing Benjamin Nygren for the away team.
In the minute 78, The home team replace Michiel Kramer with Jonas Arweiler.
Ruud Brood is making the team's third substitution at Cars Jeans Stadion with Kees de Boer replacing Pascu.
Ruud Brood (Den Haag) is making a fourth substitution, with Andrei Ratiu replacing Shaquille Pinas.
The match has come to a close in Den Haag. The final score is 1-1.
